ing: 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined and butterflied
8 ounces sharp Cheddar cheese, cut into strips
1 teaspoon Old Bay Seasoning TM, or to taste
des: "This is a real crowd pleaser! We never have any left!  We cook these on the grill, but you can also dip them in tempura batter and deep fry them."
ins:
Cut the jalapeno peppers into thin strips. Place a strip or two of jalapeno pepper and cheddar cheese inside each shrimp.
Sprinkle the stuffed shrimp with garlic powder and Old Bay Seasoning TM. Wrap each shrimp with a slice of bacon and secure with a toothpick. Thread shrimp onto skewers.
Grill over medium high heat for 10 to 15 minutes, or until firm.
